code: import React from"react";import{Card,CardContent,Typography,useTheme,responsiveFontSizes,ThemeProvider}from"@mui/material";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SkillCard=_ref=>{let{skill}=_ref;const theme=useTheme();const responsiveTheme=responsiveFontSizes(theme);const getRandomColor=()=>{const letters="0123456789ABCDEF";let color="#";for(let i=0;i<6;i++){color+=letters[Math.floor(Math.random()*16)];}return color;};const randomColor=getRandomColor();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThemeProvider,{theme:responsiveTheme,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{variant:"outlined",sx:{backgroundColor:randomColor},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardContent,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{fontWeight:"bold",textAlign:"center",sx:{fontSize:{xs:"8px",sm:"8px",md:"16px"},color:"#fff"},children:skill})})})});};export default SkillCard;
